summary: A bee keeper, Spiros, travels from the north to the south of Greece with his bees to meet the spring.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Nadia Mourouzi|Serge Reggiani|Jenny Roussea|Dinos Iliopoulos|Vasia Panagopoulou|Iakovos Panotas|Stamatis Gardelis|Mihalis Giannatos|Karyofyllia Karabeti|Konstandinos Konstandopoulos|Nikos Kouros|Christoforos Nezer|Stratos Pahis|Dimitris Poulikakos|Athinodoros Prousalis|Costas Tymvios|Dora Volanaki|Giannis Zavradinos
title: O melissokomos
